ygData.subject: RE: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Black Pearls make combo Dexterity/Agility items. So I think silver makes a 3/3 ring, gold makes a choker 7/7, an plat makes a ring 6/6.I would think Electrum
ygData.messageBody:
Black Pearls make combo Dexterity/Agility items. So I think silver makes a
3/3 ring, gold makes a choker 7/7, an plat makes a ring 6/6.I would think
Electrum makes a necklace, but I am not sure.

-----Original Message-----
From: Randy Weaver [mailto:randy@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 7:29 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the
stei n comments


From: "Randy Weaver" <randy@...>

What stats are BP Plat earrings? I have a pearl, and need to find a jewler.

> Aye, its all relative. Plats are very easy to get even after level 20. I
> have never had less than 100 in the bank since then and almost always over
> 1000. Today I am buying Blk Pearl Plat earrings and will have up
> to 1000 to
> blow on failures and if they all fail the only thing thats a pain
> is getting
> 4 more BPs to play with. Replacing the 1000 is really easy. This is why I
> love the bazaars, I trade basically useless Plats for awesome
> items I or my
> friends can actually use, what a great concept.
